body_html:
Hi @ezyang sorry but I forgot to mention that I did look through the README and also ran setup.py build with those envvars and also still encountered these errors:

[ 10%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/ATen/CPUByteTensor.cpp.o
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/CPUByteType.cpp:1:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/CPUByteType.h:2:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/Type.h:9:
/Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/../ATen/Half.h:24:17: error: implicit instantiation of undefined template
      'std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> >'
    std::string msg = "value cannot be converted to type ";
                ^
/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/../include/c++/v1/iosfwd:193:33: note: template is declared here
    class _LIBCPP_TYPE_VIS_ONLY basic_string;
                                ^
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/CPUByteType.cpp:1:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/CPUByteType.h:2:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/Type.h:9:
/Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/../ATen/Half.h:27:17: error: no member named 'to_string' in namespace
      'std'
    msg += std::to_string(f);
           ~~~~~^
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/Context.cpp:1:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/Context.h:7:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/Type.h:9:
/Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/../ATen/Half.h:24:17: error: implicit instantiation of undefined template
      'std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> >'
    std::string msg = "value cannot be converted to type ";
                ^
/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/../include/c++/v1/iosfwd:193:33: note: template is declared here
    class _LIBCPP_TYPE_VIS_ONLY basic_string;
                                ^
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/Context.cpp:1:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/Context.h:7:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/Type.h:9:
/Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/../ATen/Half.h:27:17: error: no member named 'to_string' in namespace
      'std'
    msg += std::to_string(f);

Followed by some warnings. Then

9 warnings and 2 errors generated.
10 warnings generated.
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/ATen/CPUByteType.cpp.o] Error 1
10 warnings generated.
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

[ 10%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/ATen/CPUByteTensor.cpp.o
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/CPUByteType.cpp:1:

body:
Hi @ezyang sorry but I forgot to mention that I did look through the README and also ran `setup.py build` with those envvars and also still encountered these errors:

```
[ 10%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/ATen/CPUByteTensor.cpp.o
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/CPUByteType.cpp:1:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/CPUByteType.h:2:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/Type.h:9:
/Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/../ATen/Half.h:24:17: error: implicit instantiation of undefined template
      'std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> >'
    std::string msg = "value cannot be converted to type ";
                ^
/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/../include/c++/v1/iosfwd:193:33: note: template is declared here
    class _LIBCPP_TYPE_VIS_ONLY basic_string;
                                ^
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/CPUByteType.cpp:1:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/CPUByteType.h:2:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/Type.h:9:
/Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/../ATen/Half.h:27:17: error: no member named 'to_string' in namespace
      'std'
    msg += std::to_string(f);
           ~~~~~^
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/Context.cpp:1:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/Context.h:7:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/Type.h:9:
/Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/../ATen/Half.h:24:17: error: implicit instantiation of undefined template
      'std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> >'
    std::string msg = "value cannot be converted to type ";
                ^
/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/../include/c++/v1/iosfwd:193:33: note: template is declared here
    class _LIBCPP_TYPE_VIS_ONLY basic_string;
                                ^
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/Context.cpp:1:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/Context.h:7:
In file included from /Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/build/ATen/ATen/Type.h:9:
/Users/freddiev4/Documents/opensource/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/../ATen/Half.h:27:17: error: no member named 'to_string' in namespace
      'std'
    msg += std::to_string(f);
```

Followed by some warnings. Then
```
9 warnings and 2 errors generated.
10 warnings generated.
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/ATen/CPUByteType.cpp.o] Error 1
10 warnings generated.
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
